item.description:
This week only we will meet on MONDAY evening. Nous allons nous rencontrer le lundi soir cette semaine.
It's the first day of winter, which some of us celebrate and others dread! So feel free to talk about the solstice or your favorite holiday tradition. One of our members suggested "greening" our homes by cleaning our closets. If you wish, bring un petit cadeau pour echanger. Please don't go buy something- we all have something with a little story behind it that we don't want or use that maybe someone else in the group would enjoy. C'est pas obligatoire.
item.how_to_find_us: Comme d'habitude, cherchez le tour Eiffel

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: Groupe de French MONDAY conversation
